text: is a Japanese professional baseball pitcher for the Hokkaido Nippon-Ham Fighters of the Nippon Professional Baseball (NPB). He previously played for the Tokyo Yakult Swallows of Nippon Professional Baseball (NPB). ==External links== * NPB.com Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Hokkaido Nippon-Ham Fighters players Category:Japanese baseball players Category:Nippon Professional Baseball pitchers Category:Baseball people from Tokyo Category:Tokyo Yakult Swallows players Category:2017 World Baseball Classic players
title: Ryo Akiyoshi
